attributes.action: allow those who take 2nd or 3rd jobs, to only pay tax on largest income from 1 job....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No one wants two or more jobs, but financially it may be necessary.  Tax should only be paid on the highest earning job - be it the 1st or 2nd or other.  We with 2 or more jobs are trying to help ourselves & reduce the burden of other tax payers - most of us are on benefit of one form or another and wish to get off the benefit merry-go-round.  We cannot help ourselves if we are helping the inland revenue!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
